title: Configure Aidbox FHIR server
description:
Setup Aidbox FHIR server with architecture-as-code approach:

## Prerequisites
- AIDBOX_LICENSE_ID and AIDBOX_LICENSE_KEY from https://aidbox.app

## Implementation
1. Update .env.example with Aidbox license vars
2. Update docker-compose.yaml with correct Aidbox config
3. Create aidbox/ directory with seed data
4. Add infra/setup-aidbox.sh script that:
   - Validates license keys are set
   - Starts Aidbox container
   - Waits for health check
   - Loads demo FHIR resources

## Demo Data
- Sample Patient resources
- Sample Practitioner resources
- Sample Appointment resources
- Basic FHIR R4 resources for practice workflow

## Verification
- Aidbox UI accessible at :8080
- FHIR API responds at /fhir
- Demo data queryable

title: Create Miro pitch deck (5 slides)
description:
Create 5 Miro slides for hackathon pitch. 2 min pitch, 2 min demo, 2 min Q&A.

## Slide 1: The Market Problem
- Who: ~100,000 German medical practices (Arztpraxen)
- Problem: 30-40% staff time on phone admin, 12 min avg patient wait
- Current solution: Phone + paper intake - slow, error-prone, language barriers

## Slide 2: Your Solution
- One sentence: AI voice agent that handles patient intake calls 24/7
- 10x better: Instant response, multilingual, 3-tier triage, never sleeps

## Slide 3: Business Model
- Who pays: Medical practices (B2B SaaS)
- Pricing: Per practice per month OR per call

## Slide 4: Go-to-Market Plan
- First 10 customers: Personal network in Hamburg medical community
- Distribution: Partner with PVS vendors

## Slide 5: Why You / Why Now
- Team background
- 48h learnings
- Why now: AI voice quality finally good enough

title: Setup DNS and SSL for ignis.cognovis.de
description:
Configure DNS and SSL for production-ready external access.

## DNS Setup
- Domain: ignis.cognovis.de
- Point A record to: 167.235.236.238
- Malte to configure in cognovis.de DNS

## SSL Setup (Let's Encrypt)
1. Update nginx config for domain
2. Install certbot in Docker or use acme.sh
3. Auto-renew certificates

## Implementation
1. Add DOMAIN variable to .env
2. Update setup-services.sh to accept domain parameter
3. Update nginx.conf template with domain
4. Add SSL certificate provisioning script
5. Configure automatic HTTP->HTTPS redirect

## Endpoints after setup
- https://ignis.cognovis.de/aidbox/
- https://ignis.cognovis.de/fhir/
- https://ignis.cognovis.de/n8n/
